claim_card.claim: Multiple frontier AI models independently converged on a shared claim: gravity can be reframed as gradient coherence rather than a fundamental force.
claim_card.test_hook: Audit model-to-model proposals for shared primitives and independent emergence (no shared prompt lineage); score overlap on definitions + equations + predictions.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: multiple frontier AI models ... converged ... gravity is best understood as gradient coherence
